summary: BP, short for British Petroleum, is a huge company based in London that works with oil and gas. It's one of the biggest in the world, operating in almost 80 countries. BP started in 1909 as the Anglo-Persian Oil Company and has changed names and grown a lot since then. They find, produce, and sell oil and gas, and also make electricity. BP owns thousands of gas stations worldwide. Despite some serious environmental accidents, like the Deepwater Horizon oil spill in 2010, BP remains a major player in the energy industry.
title: BP
